channel.title: Ranged Bonus not making a difference?
channel.description:
Hey guys, Im trying to make my Dragon Bow hit like a 50 so i put the Ranged Bonus for it at 10,000,000 but i only hit like 15's...
Im on v0id-pkz source, any idea how to make it hit higher?
Please help, thanks.

item.title: Ranged Bonus not making a difference?
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

Actually I had this kinda problem with my delta server, what I did (when adding a new bow) was change the D of it, one moment lemme find the code for it again lol.

if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7960)) { d *= 3.55D; } else

That went into 2 different area’s (that’s for my crossbow though), if your using delta, try finding this:

if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837)) { d *= 1.55D; } else That’s for the rune crossbow on Delta.

Read full topic
item.source: Ranged Bonus not making a difference?

item.title: Ranged Bonus not making a difference?
item.dc:creator: @Mazeingmaze Mazeingmaze
item.description:
@Mazeingmaze wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerBow] == 474) { hitdif = 0+misc.random(51); }

Something like that, I did it in this Quick Reply thing.
I doubt it will work as I don’t know the method names off by heart, but if you find them this will probably work.

Read full topic
item.source: Ranged Bonus not making a difference?
